backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and maps for chapters, verses, moods, and chatbot responses, with query methods for verse lookup, mood‑based curation, and daily verse selection.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record listing a single UI‑text consistency feature tied to ChatThread.tsx with metadata on components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Document explaining app architecture, tab flows, core components, and backend API surface.
frontend/docs/DEPLOY_REPORT.md: Template for recording deployment status, source state, steps, and errors.
frontend/docs/DEPLOY_ROOT_CAUSE.md: Stub for documenting root‑cause analysis of a deployment failure related to a ThemeProvider import.
frontend/docs/DEPLOY_RUNBOOK.md: Deployment instructions covering build steps, verification, logging, and troubleshooting.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and light/dark theme design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React shell managing tab navigation, scroll resets, read‑intent logic, background visuals, and bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer with text and voice input, handling send actions and speech-to-text integration.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Modal displaying safety disclaimers about non-medical nature of the chat experience.
Renders chat messages with support for verses, action steps, and follow‑up questions.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Displays clickable follow‑up question buttons for additional guidance.
frontend/src/components/chat/HomeAskKris: Main chat container managing messages, API calls, error handling, and UI expansion logic.
frontend/src/components/chat/MiniAskKris: Compact input widget for sending quick questions to the chat system.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Reusable error alert with retry functionality for failed queries.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Image component that swaps to fallback or placeholder on load failure.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Flow: Placeholder decorative component currently rendering nothing.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Kris: Fixed background layer showing faint Krishna‑themed scenes with a readability overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Top navigation bar controlling tab navigation and theme toggle placement.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button toggling between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Fetches and displays today's verse with loading, error, and fallback states.
Displays a verse card with collapsible Sanskrit, English translation, Gen-Z interpretation, and action step sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for chapters, verses, curated content, and chatbot responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements speech-to-text using browser recognition APIs with start/stop controls and graceful fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state synced with localStorage and system preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup, theme variables, dark mode styles, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Renders a mood selection page with cards and a detail view, enabling navigation to chat based on mood.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Displays curated verses for a selected mood with loading states and a button to start a chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main home screen with Krishna chat, hero section, and navigation to reading or discovering content.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Shows detailed verse table for a chapter with loading, error handling, and verse selection.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Lists all chapters with search, loading, and error states, allowing navigation to chapter details or today’s wisdom.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Controls navigation between chapter list, today’s wisdom, chapter details, and verse details.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Loads and displays an individual verse with error and loading states and a back action.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements the Krishna chat experience with message history, chatbot responses, and safety modal handling.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides a React context managing mood, chat history, pending messages, and read-Gita intents with helper setters and consumers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current issues, features, and build/deploy status for coordinating fixes and development tasks.
